mainmenu.title: Main menu
mainmenu.help: Usage: !prefire [PURPLE][Shortcut] [option][NORMAL] With no shortcuts, this command brings up the main menu.  Available shortcuts: [PURPLE]prac[NORMAL] [1-{0}]: Start practicing on a selected route. [PURPLE]map[NORMAL] [map name]: Switch to another map. [PURPLE]df[NORMAL] [1-6]: Set the difficulty. [PURPLE]mode[NORMAL] [rand/full]: Set training mode. [PURPLE]bw[NORMAL] [rand/ump/ak/sct/awp]: Set weapons for bots. [PURPLE]lang[NORMAL] [en/pt/zh]: Set language. en for English, pt para português, 中文选择 zh。 [PURPLE]exit[NORMAL]: Stop practicing.
mainmenu.shortcut_prompt: Type [PURPLE]!prefire help[NORMAL] for usage of shortcut commands.
mapmenu.title: Switch map
mapmenu.busy: There are other players practicing. Try again later.
mapmenu.not_available: Sorry, we don't have any practice routes for the chosen map.
practicemenu.title: Choose prefire route
practice.incompatible: Others are playing incompatible routes that might share some bots with your selected route. Please choose another practice.
practice.finish: Congratulations! You have finished your prefire practice!
practice.progress: Total number of targets: {0}; Remaining number of targets: {1}
difficulty.title: Choose a difficulty level
difficulty.3: Normal - Reheal to 100hp after a kill
weaponmenu.title: Set weapons for bots
modemenu.title: Choose a training mode In Random mode, only part of the bots will be spawned.
modemenu.set: Training mode has been set to: {0}
languagemenu.set: Your language preference has been saved.
languagemenu.help: Usage: !prefire lang [PURPLE][en/pt/zh][NORMAL]. en for English, pt para português, 中文选择 zh。
